room_title: Escape room "Witch Hunt" by Trap Door Escape Room in New York
room_description:
Youâ€™re a constable for the sheriff of Salem. A young woman is set for execution in an hour for practicing witchcraft. Her husband demands substantial evidence before her life is taken. Will you be able to find it in time?
This experience includes herbs and cooking items such as thyme, cinnamon, rosemary, sage, dill, and flour. If you or a member of your group are allergic to any of these items, you should not participate in Witch Hunt.
